metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The login page (aka index.php) in ownCloud before 5.0.6 does not disablethe autocomplete setting for the password parameter, which makes it easierfor physically proximate attackers to guess the password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
